sourcesContent:
import React from "react";
import { Form, Input, Select, Row, Col, Button } from 'antd';
const { Option } = Select;
export default function JobInfo() {
    
    const onFinish = values => {
        console.log('Received values of form: ', values);
    };

    const handlePaste = (e) => {
        console.log(e)
        console.log(e.clipboardData.getData('Text'));
        var data = e.clipboardData.items[0];
        console.log(data);
    }
    return (
        <>
            <Form name="complex-form" onFinish={onFinish} labelCol={{ span: 8 }} wrapperCol={{ span: 16 }}>
                <Row gutter={24}>
                    <Col span={12}>
                        <Form.Item
                            name="job_name"
                            label="Job name"
                            validateTrigger="onBlur"
                            rules={[
                                {
                                    required: true,
                                    message: 'Job name is required!',
                                },
                            ]}
                            onPaste={(e) = handlePaste(e)}
                        >
                            <Input placeholder="Job name" />
                        </Form.Item>
                    </Col>
                    <Col span={12}>
                        <Form.Item
                            name="pad_name"
                            label="Pad name"
                            validateTrigger="onBlur"
                            rules={[
                            {
                                required: true,
                                message: 'Pad name is required!',
                            },
                            ]}
                        >
                            <Input placeholder="Pad name" />
                        </Form.Item>
                    </Col>
                </Row>
                <Row gutter={24}>
                    <Col span={12}>
                        <Form.Item
                            name="job_type"
                            label="Job type"
                            validateTrigger="onBlur"
                            rules={[
                            {
                                required: true,
                                message: 'Job type is required!',
                            },
                            ]}
                        >
                            <Input placeholder="Job type" />
                        </Form.Item>
                    </Col>
                    <Col span={12}>
                        <Form.Item
                            name="pad_id"
                            label="Pad Id"
                            validateTrigger="onBlur"
                            rules={[
                            {
                                required: true,
                                message: 'Pad Id is required!',
                            },
                            ]}
                        >
                            <Input placeholder="Pad id" />
                        </Form.Item>
                    </Col>
                </Row>
                <Row gutter={24}>
                    <Col span={12}>
                        <Form.Item
                            name="job_id"
                            label="Job id"
                            validateTrigger="onBlur"
                            rules={[
                            {
                                required: true,
                                message: 'Job id is required!',
                            },
                            ]}
                        >
                            <Input placeholder="Job id" />
                        </Form.Item>
                    </Col>
                    <Col span={12}>
                        <Form.Item
                            name="client_name"
                            label="Client name"
                            validateTrigger="onBlur"
                            rules={[
                            {
                                required: true,
                                message: 'Client name is required!',
                            },
                            ]}
                        >
                            <Input placeholder="Client name" />
                        </Form.Item>
                    </Col>
                </Row>
                <Row gutter={24}>
                    <Col span={12}>
                        <Form.Item
                            name="afe_number"
                            label="AFE #"
                            validateTrigger="onBlur"
                            rules={[
                            {
                                required: true,
                                message: 'AFE # is required!',
                            },
                            ]}
                        >
                            <Input placeholder="AFE #" />
                        </Form.Item>
                    </Col>
                    <Col span={12}>
                        <Form.Item
                            name="customer_field_rep"
                            label="Customer field rep"
                            validateTrigger="onBlur"
                            rules={[
                            {
                                required: true,
                                message: 'Customer field rep is required!',
                            },
                            ]}
                        >
                            <Input placeholder="Customer field rep" />
                        </Form.Item>
                    </Col>
                </Row>
                <Row gutter={24}>
                    <Col span={12}>
                        <Form.Item
                            name="country"
                            label="Country"
                            validateTrigger="onBlur"
                            rules={[
                            {
                                required: true,
                                message: 'Country is required!',
                            },
                            ]}
                        >
                            <Input placeholder="Country" />
                        </Form.Item>
                    </Col>
                    <Col span={12}>
                        <Form.Item
                            name="rep_contact"
                            label="Rep contact #"
                            validateTrigger="onBlur"
                            rules={[
                            {
                                required: true,
                                message: 'Rep contact # is required!',
                            },
                            ]}
                        >
                            <Input placeholder="Rep contact #" />
                        </Form.Item>
                    </Col>
                </Row>
                <Row gutter={24}>
                    <Col span={12}>
                        <Form.Item
                            name="basin"
                            label="Basin"
                            validateTrigger="onBlur"
                            rules={[
                            {
                                required: true,
                                message: 'Basin is required!',
                            },
                            ]}
                        >
                            <Input placeholder="Basin" />
                        </Form.Item>
                    </Col>
                    <Col span={12}>
                        <Form.Item
                            name="operator"
                            label="Operator"
                            validateTrigger="onBlur"
                            rules={[
                            {
                                required: true,
                                message: 'Operator is required!',
                            },
                            ]}
                        >
                            <Input placeholder="Operator" />
                        </Form.Item>
                    </Col>
                </Row>
                <Row gutter={24}>
                    <Col span={12}>
                        <Form.Item
                            name="state"
                            label="State"
                            validateTrigger="onBlur"
                            rules={[
                            {
                                required: true,
                                message: 'State is required!',
                            },
                            ]}
                        >
                            <Input placeholder="State" />
                        </Form.Item>
                    </Col>
                    <Col span={12}>
                        <Form.Item
                            name="service_company"
                            label="Service company"
                            validateTrigger="onBlur"
                            rules={[
                            {
                                required: true,
                                message: 'Service company is required!',
                            },
                            ]}
                        >
                            <Input placeholder="Service company" />
                        </Form.Item>
                    </Col>
                </Row>
                <Row gutter={24}>
                    <Col span={12}>
                        <Form.Item
                            name="start_date"
                            label="Start date"
                            validateTrigger="onBlur"
                            rules={[
                            {
                                required: true,
                                message: 'Start date is required!',
                            },
                            ]}
                        >
                            <Input placeholder="Start date" />
                        </Form.Item>
                    </Col>
                    <Col span={12}>
                        <Form.Item
                            name="wireline_company"
                            label="Wireline company"
                            validateTrigger="onBlur"
                            rules={[
                            {
                                required: true,
                                message: 'Wireline company is required!',
                            },
                            ]}
                        >
                            <Input placeholder="Wireline company" />
                        </Form.Item>
                    </Col>
                </Row>
                
                
                
                <Form.Item label=" " colon={false}>
                    <Button type="primary" htmlType="submit">
                    Submit
                    </Button>
                </Form.Item>
            </Form>
        </>
    );
}
